---
category: news
title: "‘Online life key to language longevity’"
excerpt: "The team from DAIICT has already tasted success in analysis of tweets and online content in Gujarati and has started work on Named Entity Recognition (NER) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) for Gujarati in collaboration with IITs. The researchers said that compared to English, it’s difficult to work with language like Gujarati."
